document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2006-12
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, ADDING CHAPTER 2.02 TO TITLE 2 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE PROVIDING FOR THE DIRECT ELECTION OF THE MAYOR OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AND RELATED MATTERS FURTHER IMPLEMENTING MEASURE A
